title: CounterSpy PS3
description:
CounterSpy PS3

This game requires CFW 4.21 OR higher.

Follow those simple step to install and play in no time:

1) Copy the three files to a pen drive;
2) Plug the pen drive on your PS3;
3) Attention: Install the 3 files via "Install Packages Files" in the following order:
   a) NPUA80870-COUNTERSPY-PS3-1-.pkg;
   b) NPUA80870-COUNTERSPY-PS3-2-Update_1.01.pkg;
   c) NPUA80870-COUNTERSPY-PS3-3-FIX101[421].pkg.
4) And you're good to go!

Again, very important: You MUST follow the 1,2,3 order when installing the files.

And PLEASE SEED this torrent!

by MATanc ;-)
